plot: Two women, the wife and the mistress of Chaim Rothe find out 10 years after his death that his son and the mistress daughter had an affair.
plot_en: Two women, the wife and the mistress of Chaim Rothe find out 10 years after his death that his son and the mistress daughter had an affair.
plot_es: Two women, the wife and the mistress of Chaim Rothe find out 10 years after his death that his son and the mistress daughter had an affair.
title: Ha-Isha Ha'acheret
